lines.text: Death to all teenagers who fuck.
Poor Daddy's been under such a strain recently.
If you ask me, he's acting like he just killed someone.
Mary! Your father's a doctor... He kills people every day.

It says, "It's Halloween, it's prom night, there's a psycho loose, so don't open the door, don't answer the phone, don't look in the attic, don't go to the bathroom, don't go into the ocean, and don't go into space 'cause no one can hear you scream. Signed, A Friend."
lawnmowers do not kill people. People kill people.
I can't allow you to leave. You're either going out for drugs or drink. It's against the rules.
It's okay. We're just having some kinky sex.
